it.unibo.alchemist.boundary.wormhole.implementation

Class AngleManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unibo.alchemist.boundary.wormhole.implementation.AbstractSlideInputManager
      • it.unibo.alchemist.boundary.wormhole.implementation.AngleManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAngleManager, ISlideInputManager

    public class AngleManager
extends AbstractSlideInputManager
implements IAngleManager
    An AngleManager converts the sliding of any physical/virtual device/control into an angle expressed with radians.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double DEF_DEG_PER_PIXEL
      DEF_DEG_PER_PIXEL = "DEFault amount of DEGrees PER PIXEL".
      Currently set to 3 * 360 / screenWidth i.e.: by sliding the mouse through the entire width of the screen you will obtain a 3 rounds rotation.
      This constant is intended for an implementation that converts mouse motion over x axis into degrees.
      static double DEF_DEG_PER_WHEEL_CLICK
      DEF_DEG_PER_WHEEL_CLICK = "DEFault amount of DEGrees PER WHEEL CLICK".
      Currently set to 5.0 that seems pretty good to me.
      private double degPhase 
      private double degUnit 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AngleManager()
      Initializes a new AngleManager instance with dUnit = 1 and dPhase = 0.
      AngleManager(double dUnit)
      Initializes a new AngleManager instance with dPhase = 0.
      AngleManager(double dUnit, double dPhase)
      Initializes a new AngleManager with the initial phase and unit in input.

      • DEF_DEG_PER_WHEEL_CLICK

        public static final double DEF_DEG_PER_WHEEL_CLICK
        DEF_DEG_PER_WHEEL_CLICK = "DEFault amount of DEGrees PER WHEEL CLICK".
        Currently set to 5.0 that seems pretty good to me.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEF_DEG_PER_PIXEL

        public static final double DEF_DEG_PER_PIXEL
        DEF_DEG_PER_PIXEL = "DEFault amount of DEGrees PER PIXEL".
        Currently set to 3 * 360 / screenWidth i.e.: by sliding the mouse through the entire width of the screen you will obtain a 3 rounds rotation.
        This constant is intended for an implementation that converts mouse motion over x axis into degrees.

      • degPhase

        private double degPhase

      • AngleManager

        public AngleManager()
        Initializes a new AngleManager instance with dUnit = 1 and dPhase = 0.
        See Also:
        AngleManager(double, double)

      • AngleManager

        public AngleManager(double dUnit)
        Initializes a new AngleManager instance with dPhase = 0.
        Parameters:
        dUnit - is the amount of degrees corresponding to 1 slide (i.e. inc(1);)
        See Also:
        AngleManager(double, double)

      • AngleManager

        public AngleManager(double dUnit,
                    double dPhase)
        Initializes a new AngleManager with the initial phase and unit in input.
        Parameters:
        dUnit - is the amount of degrees corresponding to 1 slide (i.e. inc(1);)
        dPhase - is the initial rotation expressed with degrees
